Parameter.Label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
Parameter.Help: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

Parameter.Label: On/Off Command Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
Parameter.Help:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution.
This sets how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Parameter.Label: Local Control Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: Local Control Dim Rate
Parameter.Help:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution.
This sets how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Parameter.Label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
Parameter.Help:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution,
how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1,
then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55
seconds the dim level will change.
